taxonomicnotes: Subgenus (Chromaphyosemion). Aphyosemion kouamense Legros, 1999, Aphyosemion melanogaster (Legros, Zentz & Agnèse, 2005), Aphyosemion malumbresi Legros & Zentz, 2006, Aphyosemion erythron (Sonnenberg, 2007) and Aphyosemion ecucuense (Sonnenberg, 2007) from a closely related southern group of species that were all formerly subsumed under Aphyosemion splendopleure (see Sonnenberg 2007a, 2007b) and all characterised by numerous red spots in the unpaired fins.
rationale: The species is widespread within central Africa and is assessed as Least Concern.
evaluator: Brummett, R., Mbe Tawe, A.N., Dening Touokong, C., Reid, G.M., Snoeks, J. Staissny, M., Moelants, T., Mamonekene, V., Ndodet, B., Ifuta, S.N.B., Chilala, A., Monsembula, R., Ibala Zamba, A., Opoye Itoua, O., Pouomogne, V., Darwall, W. & Smith, K.

taxonomicnotes: Subgenus (Chromaphyosemion). Aphyosemion kouamense Legros, 1999, Aphyosemion melanogaster (Legros, Zentz & Agnèse, 2005), Aphyosemion malumbresi Legros & Zentz, 2006, Aphyosemion erythron (Sonnenberg, 2007) and Aphyosemion ecucuense (Sonnenberg, 2007) from a closely related southern group of species that were all formerly subsumed under Aphyosemion splendopleure (see Sonnenberg 2007a, 2007b) and all characterised by numerous red spots in the unpaired fins.
rationale: The species is widespread within central Africa and is assessed as Least Concern.
evaluator: Brummett, R., Mbe Tawe, A.N., Dening Touokong, C., Reid, G.M., Snoeks, J. Staissny, M., Moelants, T., Mamonekene, V., Ndodet, B., Ifuta, S.N.B., Chilala, A., Monsembula, R., Ibala Zamba, A., Opoye Itoua, O., Pouomogne, V., Darwall, W. & Smith, K.

rationale: The habitat of the two locations the species has been located in the Komo River and near Cape Esturias are very different. The Cape Esturias location needs to be checked. More information is needed on the species distribution before a full Red List assessment can be made.
evaluator: Brummett, R., Mbe Tawe, A.N., Dening Touokong, C., Reid, G.M., Snoeks, J. Staissny, M., Moelants, T., Mamonekene, V., Ndodet, B., Ifuta, S.N.B., Chilala, A., Monsembula, R., Ibala Zamba, A., Opoye Itoua, O., Pouomogne, V., Darwall, W. & Smith, K.
